name: Aztec
description: Aztec is a privacy-first Layer 2 (L2) solution built on Ethereum. Its primary purpose is to bring privacy to the otherwise publicly visible transactions on the Ethereum blockchain. Aztec achieves this by operating as a new alternative virtual machine (alt-VM), diverging from EVM compatibility to extend the Ethereum ecosystem with private smart contracts using zero-knowledge proofs.

docsIntegration.text: Official documentation for operators (running sequencers, full nodes, provers) is available
Integrations/tools include Aztec.js (library to interact with contracts) and Aztec.nr (Noir framework for private smart contracts). The network uses Noir for zk circuits.
